<features> ['CableExtensionAdapters']
response:
The luxurious cabin on our cruise liner comes equipped with state-of-the-art technology. The Yamaha HTR-5660 6-Channel Digital Home Theater Receiver (Discontinued by Manufacturer) allows you to enjoy your favorite movies or music in stunning surround sound. With its 85 watts per channel (x 6), Decoding for DTS-ES Discrete 6.1, DTS-ES Matrix 6.1, DTS Neo:6, Dolby Digital EX, and Dolby Pro Logic II, 24 distinct sound programs with 44 variations meet every sound need. It also has four optical and one coaxial digital inputs, five S-Video inputs and two outputs, a set of front panel A/V inputs, and measures 17-1/8 x 6-7/16 x 15-3/8 inches (W x H x D). Weighing at only 25 pounds, this unit will provide hours of entertainment while staying compact enough to fit into any space.

For those who prefer watching television, the Sony KV-20FV12 20” Trinitron Wega Flat-Screen TV offers a great viewing experience. Its 20-inch screen with Trinitron flat picture tube gives you clear images and vibrant colors. This model features a 3-line digital comb filter which improves image resolution and clarity, speedy Channel Surfing, 5 Favorite Channel Preset, and a Sleep Timer. Additionally, there are two sets of Composite Inputs (one front and one rear), S-Video Input, Audio Output, Headphone Jack, and a 10-watt DAC Speaker System (5 watts x 2) with Matrix Surround and MTS decoders. All of these features make sure you get the best possible viewing experience during your voyage.

Finally, if you want to connect multiple devices together without having to worry about cables getting tangled up, then the GE AV93203 Cable Extension Adapter is perfect for you! This adapter can extend the length of HDMI, VGA, RCA, Component Video, and Coaxial cable connections so you don’t have to worry about running out of ports. Plus, it includes a built-in power supply, making it easy to use anywhere.

Our rooms feature state-of-the-art technology such as Cerwin-Vega CLSC-6 Classic Series 6.5-Inch 2-Way Bookshelf Speakers and Sony KV-32XBR450 32” XBR Wega Flat-Screen HDTV Monitors. You’re also able to take advantage of Picture-in-Picture capabilities so you don’t miss out on anything during your voyage. Additionally, we offer C2G 29118 Velocity Bass Management Subwoofer Cables which allows you to easily connect a powerful subwoofer to handle extreme dynamic audio. For those who want even more immersion, we recommend the C2G 29118 Velocity Bass Management Subwoofer Cable. It has a longer length than other cables, allowing you to place the subwoofer in a better location for maximum bass output. Last but certainly not least, we have the perfect accessory for movie night – the C2G 29118 Velocity Bass Management Subwoofer Cable. This cable features a specialty design that allows you to connect multiple devices at once, making it ideal for watching movies with friends and family. Enjoy your time on board and make sure to check out some of our other amenities like the spa, pool, and gym.
